tests.comment: The max sum can be found by considering the entire array.
All elements are negative; the more we add, the smaller the sum gets. Therefore, the largest sum turns out to the be the max element, just -1.
The max subarray sum is from [2,5].
The max subarray sum is just the entire array.
The max subarray sum is the subarray [3, -1, 1000, 2, 5] since the first element would reduce it.
